name: World of Simple Design
overview:
World of Simple Design is a product design company that specializes in making iPhone docks with a modern design aesthetic.

Based in Los Angeles, our team of designers are all Apple enthusiasts and have backgrounds in industrial engineering, music, video and Danish Modern design. Our first project, The Foundation Dock iPhone stand and multi-functional media dock, was funded on Kickstarter.

Podi-m, a beautiful dock for iPhone and iPad, was funded on Kickstarter in Dec 2012. The first wave of Podi-m orders started shipping to backers in Dec/Jan and backers are thrilled with their one of a kind charging dock.

Q-ube is a new product that was released in May 2013 to enhance the sound of your iPhone’s speakers while being docked. Q-ube is made locally in Los Angeles and every dock is unique.
